p.k: Family Ties Vala's father contacts the team with a deal in mind to trade details of planned attacks on Earth in exchange for sanctuary on the planet. However, their trust in him takes a hit when he is found to be associating with one of Arkad's Jaffa splinter cells. Despite being rumbled, he insists his information will be valuable - prompting Vala to rethink her opinion of him. Sci-fi drama, starring Claudia Black
